messages.subject: Hi and another intro
messages.msgSnippet: HI! I have been lurking for quite sometime, and thouroughly enjoying your lively conversations! My name is Sheri and I have five great kids, Mike is 13 (and
messages.messageBody:
HI! I have been lurking for quite sometime, and thouroughly enjoying your
lively conversations!

My name is Sheri and I have five great kids, Mike is 13 (and 6'1"...can you
believe it? I can't, teehee),David is 8 1/2 (and the best speller in the
house), Andrew is 7 (and has beautiful handwriting already), Joshua is 5
(and my future athlete), and then there is my only girl Tirzah' she is 3
(and very dramatic). I am married, to Dale and unfortunatly he isn't very
involved.

My oldest didn't learn to read until he was 10 and is only now getting
interested in actually doing it. His spelling is terrible, but since he
found the internet and has some YIM friends, he is learning. Of course now I
have to "fight" for the computer....LOL. David is the opposite, he taught
himself to read at age 6 and hasn't stopped. Life is never boring around
here! :)

Oh yeah, I live in Maine, at least for a few more months. My husband is in
the Coast Guard, so we move everything 3 years or so. We are due to move
soon. Most of the family considers moves as adventures, but my oldest is
having a harder time of it.

Well, I didn't mean to write a novella. hahhahaha.... I will end it here. I
look forward to getting to know you all better. :)

~Sheri
